name: From Jayni to "Lola Rose" Online Quiz | Kid Lit Authors L - Z | 10 Questions

questions.text: What is Jayni's mum's first name?
questions.explanation:
Nikki.

	She married Jay Fenton. Jay and Nikki were about to split up, when Nikki told Jay that she was pregnant with Jayni. Janyi's name is a mix of her parents' names.(Jay + Ni=Jayni).

questions.text: From which disease did Jayni's Grandmum die?
questions.explanation:
Cancer.

	Nikki gets diagnosed with breast cancer. She survives, though she nearly died one week. Harpreet's great auntie had a stroke, fell and hit her chest and died of breast cancer.

questions.text: How many pounds does Nikki win from the lottery?
questions.explanation:
10,000.

	Nikki asked for it in five pound notes. Jayni didn't want to tell Jay about the lottery money, fearing he would waste it but Nikki told Jay about it, and he was going to waste about five thousand pounds on a car for his new job. That night, after Jay started to hit Jayni too, they run away with the ten thousand pounds.

questions.text: What did Nikki change her name to?
questions.explanation:
Victoria.

	Her new name was Victoria Luck. She chose Victoria, because she liked Posh best of the Spice girls.

questions.text: What is the name of Jayni's class teacher?
questions.explanation:
It isn't mentioned.

	Miss Balsam is the headteacher. She takes art for Jayni's class. She smokes a lot and has a lighter in the shape of a fish.

questions.text: What is the name of Kenny's class teacher?
questions.explanation:
Miss Denby.

	At first, Jayni thought Miss Denby was an older sister like her! She is very kind.

questions.text: In Kenny's reception class, there is another boy called Kendall.
questions.explanation:
False.

	There is another girl called Kendall. A boy called, 'Scabby', laughs and makes fun of Kenny when he tells Miss Denby his name is Kendall.

questions.text: When Nikki, Jayni and Kendall went out with Jake, where did they go?
questions.explanation:
Camden Lock Market & Camden Lock.

	Jayni wants to go to the ladies, then when they come out, they can't find Kenny and Jake. In the end, they were in a stall buying pancakes. Kenny chose blackcurrant jam for Jayni, seeing purple is her favorite color.

questions.text: In the beginning of the book, Jayni was cutting out scraps in for her scrapbook. She names some of the Victorian girls. What are their names?
questions.explanation:
Charlotte, Victoria, Emily, Evangeline, Jemima.

	It took Jayni ages to think of those special names. She cut out pictures of faces from "Girltalk" magazine and pasted them in the Victorian house in the background.
